value.string: Task description: This runs all the subtasks within the process
Task Dependecies: N/A(This is the master task)
Stop task and send an email to RPA Support if there is a missing variable in the input config file

This Variable is passed from the error handling statement in task 1.1, if there is a defect in the subtask, (ie not being able to read the config filee) an email is sent within that error handling line and the vErrorConfigDefect is set to 2, which will stop the whole process
Pass variable to the main task to stop the process and send an email to RPA Support if there is an error creating the folder structures
Pass variable to the main task to stop the process and send an email to RPA Support if the shared drive is inaccessible
Pass variable to the main task to stop the process and send an email to RPA Support if there is an error connecting to Oracle
